item.title: Giulio Erasmus & Band + Torx + Horizontaler Gentransfer + NMT
item.description: 05 Sept 2024 doors ??h?? startttt ??h?? Giulio Erasmus + Band … Torx (tape release + splitter records label launch) … Horizontaler Gentransfer … NMT The new solo project of rébecca bonté, also part of the lo-fi pop duo acte bonté. Midlife aesthetic crisis with screaming attempts, various noise strata and velocious kick variations. Disjointed pop songs mainly guided by fear and shyness. First album to be released on french label Tanzprocesz.
